vaccination.description.0.en: The purpose of the vaccination questionnaire is to find out more about protection given by the vaccine and monitor vaccination uptake in Italy.
vaccination.description.0.et: Vaktsineerimise küsimustiku eesmärk on saada rohkem teavet vaktsiini pakutava kaitse kohta ja jälgida vaktsineerimise populaarsust Eestis.

vaccination.Q0.title.0.en: Four weeks ago you received a questionnaire about your vaccination status.  This new questionnaire is to monitor any further changes. Select the option that applies to you.
vaccination.Q0.title.0.et: Neli nädalat tagasi saite küsimustiku oma vaktsineerimisoleku kohta.  See uus küsimustik on mõeldud edasiste muudatuste jälgimiseks. Märkige teie jaoks sobiv valik.

vaccination.Q0.rg.scg.option.0.en: In the meantime I received a new vaccine dose, or a new invitation to be vaccinated.
vaccination.Q0.rg.scg.option.0.et: Sain vahepeal uue vaktsiinidoosi või uue vaktsineerimiskutse.

vaccination.Q0.rg.scg.option.1.en: In the meantime nothing has changed in terms of vaccination for me.
vaccination.Q0.rg.scg.option.1.et: Minu jaoks pole vahepeal vaktsineerimise osas midagi muutunud.

vaccination.Q0.rg.scg.option.2.en: I'm not sure, and would like to take these questions to make sure my information on vaccination is up to date.
vaccination.Q0.rg.scg.option.2.et: Ma ei ole kindel oma vaktsineerimise staatuses, et oma vaktsineerimise andmeid  esitada  ja seetõttu ma ei soovi küsimusele vastata

vaccination.Q0.privacy.note.en: (**) By selecting one of these options you give your consent to use your historical data to prefill this survey's responses.
vaccination.Q0.privacy.note.et: (**) Valides ühe neist valikutest, annate nõusoleku kasutada oma varasemaid andmeid selle küsitluse vastuste eeltäitmiseks.

vaccination.HV.Q9.title.0.en: Did you receive a flu vaccine during the previous flu season ?

vaccination.HV.Q9.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to study what level of protection the vaccine provides. We would also like to know if there is any protection from vaccines received in previous years.
vaccination.HV.Q9.helpGroup.text.1.et: Soovime uurida, millise kaitsetaseme vaktsiin annab. Samuti soovime teada, kas varasematel aastatel saadud vaktsiinid pakuvad mingit kaitset.

vaccination.HV.Q9.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q9.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q9.helpGroup.text.3.en: Answer 'yes' if you were vaccinated in the previous autumn/winter season

vaccination.HV.Q10.title.0.en: Have you received a flu vaccine this autumn/winter season?
vaccination.HV.Q10.title.0.et: Kas olete sel sügis-talvisel hooajal gripivaktsiini saanud? (2024-2025)

vaccination.HV.Q10.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to be able to work out how much protection the vaccine gives.
vaccination.HV.Q10.helpGroup.text.1.et: Soovime välja selgitada, kui palju kaitset vaktsiin annab.

vaccination.HV.Q10.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q10.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q10.helpGroup.text.3.en: Report yes, if you received the vaccine this season, usually in the autumn. If you get vaccinated after filling in this questionnaire, please return to this and update your answer.
vaccination.HV.Q10.helpGroup.text.3.et: Vastake „jah“, kui saite vaktsiini sel hooajal, tavaliselt sügisel. Kui teid vaktsineeritakse pärast selle küsimustiku täitmist, naaske selle juurde ja värskendage oma vastust.

vaccination.HV.Q10b.title.0.en: When were you vaccinated against flu this season ?
vaccination.HV.Q10b.title.0.et: Millal teid sel hooajal (2024-2025) gripi vastu vaktsineeriti?

vaccination.HV.Q10b.helpGroup.text.1.en: Knowing when people get vaccinated tells us how the vaccination program is being followed, as well as the effectiveness of the vaccine.
vaccination.HV.Q10b.helpGroup.text.1.et: Teadmine, millal inimesi vaktsineeritakse, annab meile teada, kuidas vaktsineerimisprogrammi järgitakse, ja ka kui efektiivne vaktsiin on.

vaccination.HV.Q10b.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q10b.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q10b.helpGroup.text.3.en: Try to answer as precisely as possible. If you do not know the exact date, provide as close an estimate as possible. For example, if you remember the month, try to recall if it was in the beginning or end of the month. Did any important events take place (such as holidays or birthdays) that may help you to refresh your memory?
vaccination.HV.Q10b.helpGroup.text.3.et: Püüdke vastata võimalikult täpselt. Kui te ei tea täpset kuupäeva, esitage võimalikult lähedane hinnanguline aeg. Näiteks kui mäletate kuud, proovige meenutada, kas see oli kuu alguses või lõpus. Kas sel ajal toimusid olulised sündmused (nt pühad või sünnipäevad), mis võivad aidata teil mälu värskendada?

vaccination.HV.Q10c.title.0.en: What were your reasons for getting a seasonal influenza vaccination this year?
vaccination.HV.Q10c.title.0.et: Mis olid teie põhjused, miks te sel aastal hooajalise gripi vastu end vaktsineerida lasite?

vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.0.en: I belong to a risk group (e.g, pregnant, over 65, underlying health condition, etc)
vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.0.et: Kuulun riskirühma (nt rase, üle 65-aastane, üldine tervislik seisund jne)

vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.1.en: Vaccination decreases my risk of getting influenza
vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.1.et: Vaktsineerimine vähendab minu riski haigestuda grippi.

vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.2.en: Vaccination decreases the risk of spreading influenza to others
vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.2.et: Vaktsineerimine vähendab gripi levitamise ohtu teistele.

vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.4.en: It was recommended in my workplace/school

vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.5.en: The vaccine was readily available and vaccine administration was convenient
vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.5.et: Vaktsiin oli kergesti kättesaadav ja vaktsiini manustamine oli mugav

vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.7.en: I don't want to miss work/school

vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.9.en: I try to protect myself against infections, because of the circulation of the pandemic coronavirus
vaccination.HV.Q10c.rg.mcg.option.9.et: Püüan end kaitsta nakkuste eest pandeemilise koroonaviiruse leviku tõttu

vaccination.HV.Q10d.title.0.en: What were your reasons for NOT getting a seasonal influenza vaccination for this current season ?
vaccination.HV.Q10d.title.0.et: Mis olid teie põhjused, miks te EI lasknud end hooajalise gripi vastu vaktsineerida hooajal 2024/2025?

vaccination.HV.Q10d.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to know why some people get vaccinated and others do not.
vaccination.HV.Q10d.helpGroup.text.1.et: Tahaksime teada, miks mõned inimesed lasevad end vaktsineerida ja teised mitte.

vaccination.HV.Q10d.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q10d.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q10d.helpGroup.text.3.en: Tick all those reasons that were important in your decision.
vaccination.HV.Q10d.helpGroup.text.3.et: Märkige kõik need põhjused, mis teie otsuse tegemisel olulised olid.

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.0.en: I am planning to be vaccinated, but haven't been yet
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.0.et: Ma plaanin end vaktsineerida, kuid pole veel jõudnud

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.1.en: I haven't been offered the vaccine

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.2.en: I don't belong to a risk group

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.3.en: It is better to build your own natural immunity against influenza
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.3.et: Parem on luua oma loomulik immuunsus gripi vastu

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.4.en: I doubt that the influenza vaccine is effective
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.4.et: Ma kahtlen, kas gripivaktsiin on efektiivne

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.6.en: I don't think I am likely to get influenza
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.6.et: Ma ei usu, et mul on tõenäosus grippi haigestuda

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.7.en: I believe that influenza vaccine can cause influenza
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.7.et: Ma usun, et gripivaktsiin võib põhjustada grippi

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.8.en: I am worried that the vaccine is not safe or will cause illness or other adverse events
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.8.et: Olen mures, et vaktsiin ei ole ohutu või põhjustab haigusi või muid kõrvaltoimeid,

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.10.en: The vaccine is not readily available to me
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.10.et: Vaktsiin ei ole mulle kergesti kättesaadav

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.11.en: The vaccine is not free of charge

vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.13.en: Although my doctor recommend a vaccine, I do not get one
vaccination.HV.Q10d.rg.mcg.option.13.et: Mu arst küll soovitab vaktsineerida, aga ma ei tee seda

vaccination.HV.Q35.title.0.en: Have you received a COVID-19 vaccine?

vaccination.HV.Q35.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to be able to work out how much protection the vaccine gives.
vaccination.HV.Q35.helpGroup.text.1.et: Soovime välja selgitada, kui palju kaitset vaktsiin annab.

vaccination.HV.Q35.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35.helpGroup.text.3.en: Report yes, if you received a COVID-19 vaccine (since December 2020).
vaccination.HV.Q35.helpGroup.text.3.et: Märkige „jah“, kui olete saanud COVID-19 vaktsiini (alates detsembrist 2020).

vaccination.HV.Q35.rg.scg.option.0.en: Yes, I received at least one COVID-19 vaccine
vaccination.HV.Q35.rg.scg.option.0.et: Jah, ma sain vähemalt ühe COVID-19 vaktsiini doosi

vaccination.HV.Q35.rg.scg.option.1.en: No, I did not receive the COVID-19 vaccine
vaccination.HV.Q35.rg.scg.option.1.et: Ei, ma ei saanud COVID-19 vaktsiini

vaccination.HV.Q35i.title.0.en: Which COVID-19 vaccine(s) did you receive?

vaccination.HV.Q35i.helpGroup.text.1.en: We want to know how many people got vaccinated with what brand
vaccination.HV.Q35i.helpGroup.text.1.et: Tahame teada, kui palju inimesi millise kaubamärgi vaktsiiniga vaktsineeriti

vaccination.HV.Q35i.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35i.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35i.helpGroup.text.3.en: Specify which brand (or brands if you hade more than one type) you got vaccinated with
vaccination.HV.Q35i.helpGroup.text.3.et: Täpsustage, millise kaubamärgi (või kaubamärkide, kui te saite rohkem kui üht tüüpi) vaktsiiniga teid vaktsineeriti

vaccination.HV.Q35c.title.0.en: How many doses of the vaccine did you receive?

vaccination.HV.Q35c.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to be able to work out how much protection a complete vaccination scheme gives.
vaccination.HV.Q35c.helpGroup.text.1.et: Soovime välja selgitada, kui palju kaitset täielik vaktsineerimisskeem annab.

vaccination.HV.Q35c.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35c.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35c.helpGroup.text.3.en: Report the number of doses you received (which corresponds to the number of time you were vaccinated against COVID-19 ).
vaccination.HV.Q35c.helpGroup.text.3.et: Märkige saadud annuste arv (mis vastab sellele, mitu korda teid COVID-19 vastu vaktsineeriti).

vaccination.HV.Q35j.title.0.en: When did you receive your last injection of a vaccine against COVID-19? If you do not know the exact date, provide an estimate.
vaccination.HV.Q35j.title.0.et: Millal saite viimase COVID-19 vastase vaktsiinisüsti? Kui te ei tea täpset kuupäeva, esitage hinnanguline aeg.

vaccination.HV.Q35j.helpGroup.text.1.en: Knowing when people are vaccinated tells us how well the vaccination program is being carried out.
vaccination.HV.Q35j.helpGroup.text.1.et: Teadmine, millal inimesi vaktsineeritakse, näitab meile, kui hästi vaktsineerimisprogrammi läbi viiakse.

vaccination.HV.Q35j.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35j.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35j.helpGroup.text.3.en: Please try and answer as accurately as possible. If you do not know the precise date, please give your best estimate of the month and year of vaccination.
vaccination.HV.Q35j.helpGroup.text.3.et: Palun püüdke vastata võimalikult täpselt. Kui te ei tea täpset kuupäeva, esitage hinnanguline vaktsineerimiskuu ja -aasta.

vaccination.HV.Q35k.title.0.en: Do you plan to receive a second injection in the upcoming weeks?
vaccination.HV.Q35k.title.0.et: Kas plaanite lähinädalatel teha teise süsti?

vaccination.HV.Q35k.helpGroup.text.1.en: We want to study how long it takes for people to get the second dose after having received the first
vaccination.HV.Q35k.helpGroup.text.1.et: Tahame uurida, kui kaua aega läheb inimestel pärast esimese annuse saamist enne, kui nad saavad teise annuse

vaccination.HV.Q35k.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35k.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35k.helpGroup.text.3.en: Select the option that is most appropriate for your situation
vaccination.HV.Q35k.helpGroup.text.3.et: Valige oma olukorrale kõige sobivam variant

vaccination.HV.Q35l.title.0.et: Miks lasite teha ainult ühe süsti?

vaccination.HV.Q35l.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to know the reasons behind the selected option of receiving just one dose
vaccination.HV.Q35l.helpGroup.text.1.et: Soovime teada põhjuseid, miks inimesed valivad ainult ühe annuse

vaccination.HV.Q35l.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35l.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35l.helpGroup.text.3.en: Select the option that is most appropriate for your situation
vaccination.HV.Q35l.helpGroup.text.3.et: Valige oma olukorrale kõige sobivam variant

vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.0.en: I had COVID-19 before my first injection.
vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.0.et: Mul oli COVID-19 enne esimest süsti.

vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.1.en: I had COVID-19 shortly after my first injection, and have to wait several months to receive the second injection.
vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.1.et: Mul oli COVID-19 vahetult pärast esimest süsti ja pean mitu kuud ootama enne, kui saan teha teise süsti.

vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.2.en: I received Janssen vaccine, which requires only one injection.

vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.3.en: A second injection was contraindicated for me by a doctor (I had a severe allergic reaction, or a severe adverse effect after the first injection, or I have a temporary contraindication due to a treatment or a disease).
vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.3.et: Teine süst oli mulle arsti poolt vastunäidustatud (mul oli raske allergiline reaktsioon või tõsine kõrvaltoime pärast esimest süsti või mul on ajutine vastunäidustus ravi või haiguse tõttu).

vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.4.en: I changed my mind and don’t want to be vaccinated anymore.
vaccination.HV.Q35l.rg.scg.option.4.et: Muutsin meelt ja ei taha enam vaktsineerida.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.title.0.en: What are your reason(s) for getting a COVID-19 vaccination?
vaccination.HV.Q35f.title.0.et: Mis on teie COVID-19 vastu vaktsineerimise põhjus(ed)?

vaccination.HV.Q35f.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to know the main reasons why people get the vaccine.
vaccination.HV.Q35f.helpGroup.text.1.et: Soovime teada peamisi põhjuseid, miks inimesed lasevad end vaktsineerida.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35f.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35f.helpGroup.text.3.en: Please select the options that mattered to take your decision.
vaccination.HV.Q35f.helpGroup.text.3.et: Palun märkige valikud, mis olid teie otsuse tegemiseks olulised.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.0.en: The vaccination is recommended by public health authorities.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.1.en: I belong to a group who is at risk of complications in case of COVID-19 (over 65 of age, underlying health condition, obesity, etc.).
vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.1.et: Kuulun gruppi, kellel on COVID-19 puhul tüsistuste risk (üle 65-aastane, üldine tervislik seisund, rasvumine jne).

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.2.en: I work in close contact with people at risk of complications in case of COVID-19 (working in a nursing home, health staff…).
vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.2.et: Töötan tihedas kontaktis inimestega, kellel on COVID-19 tüsistuste oht (töö hooldekodus, tervishoiutöötajad...).

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.3.en: Vaccination decreases my risk of getting COVID-19.
vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.3.et: Vaktsineerimine vähendab minu riski haigestuda COVID-19-sse.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.4.en: Vaccination decreases the risk of spreading COVID-19 to others.
vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.4.et: Vaktsineerimine vähendab COVID-19 levitamise ohtu teistele.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.6.en: It was recommended in my workplace/school.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.7.en: The vaccine was readily available and vaccine administration was convenient.
vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.7.et: Vaktsiin oli kergesti kättesaadav ja vaktsiini manustamine oli mugav.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.9.en: I don’t want to miss work/school.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.10.en: I always accept vaccination when it is offered to me.
vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.10.et: Ma nõustun alati vaktsineerimisega, kui mulle seda pakutakse.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.11.en: I have to be vaccinated to work.
vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.11.et: Ma pean olema vaktsineeritud, et töötada.

vaccination.HV.Q35f.rg.mcg.option.12.en: To obtain a valid vaccination passport.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.title.0.en: What were your reasons for NOT getting a COVID-19 vaccination? Select the options that are most applicable.
vaccination.HV.Q35m.title.0.et: Mis olid teie põhjused, miks te EI lasknud end COVID-19 vastu vaktsineerida?

vaccination.HV.Q35m.helpGroup.text.1.en: We would like to know the main reasons why people are declining COVID-19 vaccination.
vaccination.HV.Q35m.helpGroup.text.1.et: Soovime teada peamisi põhjuseid, miks inimesed COVID-19 vastu vaktsineerimisest loobuvad.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.helpGroup.text.2.en: How should I answer this question?
vaccination.HV.Q35m.helpGroup.text.2.et: Kuidas ma peaksin sellele küsimusele vastama?

vaccination.HV.Q35m.helpGroup.text.3.en: Please select the options that mattered to take your decision.
vaccination.HV.Q35m.helpGroup.text.3.et: Palun märkige valikud, mis olid teie otsuse tegemiseks olulised.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.0.en: I am planning to be vaccinated but haven’t been yet
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.0.et: Ma plaanin end vaktsineerida, kuid pole veel jõudnud.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.1.en: I haven't been offered the vaccine

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.2.en: I have been discouraged from being vaccinated because I am pregnant
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.2.et: Mulle on soovitatud mitte vaktsineerida, sest olen rase.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.3.en: I am pregnant and I fear the vaccine could be dangerous for my baby
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.3.et: Olen rase ja kardan, et vaktsiin võib olla mu lapsele ohtlik.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.4.en: I don’t belong to a risk group

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.5.en: It is better to build your own natural immunity against COVID-19
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.5.et: Parem on luua oma loomulik immuunsus COVID-19 vastu.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.6.en: I doubt that the COVID-19 vaccine is effective
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.6.et: Ma kahtlen, kas COVID-19 vaktsiin on efektiivne.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.8.en: Because of COVID-19 pandemic, I avoid seeing doctors or going to the pharmacy
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.8.et: Väldin COVID-19 pandeemia tõttu arstide ja apteegi külastamist.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.9.en: I don't think I am likely to get the COVID-19
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.9.et: Ma ei usu, et mul on tõenäosus COVID-19-sse haigestuda

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.10.en: I believe that the COVID-19 vaccine can cause COVID-19
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.10.et: Ma usun, et COVID-19 vaktsiin võib põhjustada COVID-19-sse haigestumist.

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.11.en: I am worried that the vaccine is not safe or will cause illness or other adverse events
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.11.et: Olen mures, et vaktsiin ei ole ohutu või põhjustab haigusi või muid kõrvaltoimeid,

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.13.en: The vaccine is not readily available to me
vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.13.et: Vaktsiin ei ole mulle kergesti kättesaadav

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.14.en: I disagree with the current vaccine policy

vaccination.HV.Q35m.rg.mcg.option.15.en: The vaccine is not free of charge

vaccination.surveyEnd.title.0.en: Thank you! This was all for now, please submit (push « send ») your responses.
vaccination.surveyEnd.title.0.et: Täname teid! See on selleks korraks kõik, palun esitage oma vastused (vajutage „Saada“) .
